T16D4382:310b-0: @310b ` // sbyin pa'i rabs kyi smon lam bzhugs /
T16D4382:310b-2: * // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4382:310b-3: zas skom bzang po ro zhim zhing mdog sdug la dri bsung ldan zhing ngad ldang ba /
T16D4382:310b-4: yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan pa /
T16D4382:310b-5: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i nags tshal dkon zhing dri ma med la rgyan gyis klubs pa /
T16D4382:310b-6: yal ga'i thor to'i ljid kyis g-yur za la mgo
T16D4382:310b-7: lcogs me tog kha phye zhing 'dab mas legs par
T16D4382:310b-8: brgyan te / bung ba lang long khyus lding zhing
T16D4382:310b-9: 'phungs pa rnams kyis gzhib cing non pa'i shugs kyis
T16D4382:310b-11: rin chen yal ga dang margad lcug phran gyi bla
T16D4382:310b-12: re 'jol ba dag mngon par sgrub par byed pa
T16D4382:310b-13: / 'gro ba dag tu ma tshor bar 'gro ba'i
T16D4382:310b-14: g-yang sa chen po yang ba dag tu mar me
T16D4382:310b-15: snang gsal dag cing dri ma med pa lta bu
T16D4382:310b-16: byin pa gang la bsod nams dang /
T16D4382:310b-17: bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang /
T16D4382:310b-19: dge ba'i rgyu dang mthun pa bde dgu'i gzhir gyur
T16D4382:310b-20: pa des ni sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid che
T16D4382:310b-21: ba che ge mo zhig gi lus dge ba bcu'i
T16D4382:310b-22: las kyi lam gyis bsgrubs pa la tshe dang /
T16D4382:310b-29: spobs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / sbyin
T16D4382:310b-30: bdag gi bsod nams ma skyes pa rnams ni skye
T16D4382:310b-31: bar gyur cig / sbyin bdag gi bsod nams skyes
T16D4382:310b-32: zin pa rnams ni 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig
T16D4382:310b-33: / sbyin bdag gi pha ma mchog tu dka' ba
T16D4382:311a-3: 'dzam bu'i gling skra yer yer mig gis mthong bar
T16D4382:311a-4: byed pas kyang bsod nams kyi phud kyi skal shas
T16D4382:311a-5: thob par gyur cig / de bzhin du sbyin bdag
T16D4382:311a-9: sbyin bdag gi gnyen 'dun mdza' bshes rgyas pa'i tshan
T16D4382:311a-10: ris gang dag 'khod cing 'tsho la gnas pa de
T16D4382:311a-11: dag kyang tshe ring zhing longs spyod che la g-yog
T16D4382:311a-12: 'khor mang bar gyur cig / gang dag 'das shing
T16D4382:311a-13: tshe 'phos pa de dag kyang 'gro ba skye ba'i
T16D4382:311a-14: gnas dang gnas tha dad pa'i khyad par thob par
T16D4382:311a-15: gyur te ; / lha'i gnas su skye bar gyur
T16D4382:311a-16: nas 'phags pa byams pa'i zhal snga nas mnyes par
T16D4382:311a-17: byed par gyur cig / de bzhin du rgyal po'i
T16D4382:311a-18: mchog rgyal po chen po mnga' bdag dam pa dpal
T16D4382:311a-19: lha btsan pos ma phebs pa rnams ni phebs par
T16D4382:311a-20: gyur cig / phebs zin pa rnams ni cham du
T16D4382:311a-21: phebs par gyur cig / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur
T16D4382:311a-22: ba'i rgyal srid kyang brnyes par gyur cig / de
T16D4382:311a-23: bzhin du khyed nye 'khor gyi grong khyer na gnas
T16D4382:311a-28: dmangs rigs la sogs pa yul gyi mi rnams la
T16D4382:311a-29: nad med cing gnod pa med par gyur cig /
T16D4382:311a-30: de bzhin du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
T16D4382:311a-31: dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
T16D4382:311a-33: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
T16D4382:311a-34: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
T16D4382:311a-36: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bde ba'i ri bo dang /
T16D4382:311a-39: lnga len la sogs pa dang /
T16D4382:311a-40: nor bu bzang dang rdzogs bzang gnyis dang /
T16D4382:311a-41: 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
T16D4382:311a-42: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang /
T16D4382:311a-50: sbyin bdag gi khyim 'di na gnas pa'i lha rnams dang /
T16D4382:311b-0: sbyin bdag gis bsten pa'i lha khyad par gyi de @311b dag gzi byin dang /
T16D4382:311b-2: gzhal med khang rnams rgyas par gyur cig / de
T16D4382:311b-3: dag gzi byin dang ldan par gyur cig / stobs
T16D4382:311b-5: gzhan gyis mi tshugs par gyur /
T16D4382:311b-6: dbang che bar grags par gyur nas /
T16D4382:311b-7: sbyin bdag bdag nyid chen po 'di nyid kyi mdzod dang /
T16D4382:311b-10: phyugs bdag sna tshogs kyi khyu dang /
T16D4382:311b-13: bla 'og gi bya ba thams cad la chos bzhin du bsrung ba dang /
T16D4382:311b-15: sba bar byed par gyur cig / gnod pa thams
T16D4382:311b-16: cad ni bzlog par gyur cig / don du bsgrubs
T16D4382:311b-17: pa rnams ni snang bar gyur cig / de bzhin
T16D4382:311b-18: du sbyin bdag gi dad pa dang sbyar te dmyal
T16D4382:311b-19: bar skyes pa rnams kyi gnod pa'i sdug bsngal thams
T16D4382:311b-20: cad zhi bar gyur cig / dud 'gro rnams gcig
T16D4382:311b-21: la gcig za ba rnam zlog par gyur cig /
T16D4382:311b-22: yi dgas rnams kyi bkres shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal
T16D4382:311b-23: thams cad zhi bar gyur cig / mi rnams tshol
T16D4382:311b-24: khros g-yen spyo ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar
T16D4382:311b-25: gyur cig / lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung
T16D4382:311b-26: ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang /
T16D4382:311b-27: rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar
T16D4382:311b-28: gyur cig / mdor na khams gsum du skye ba'i
T16D4382:311b-29: sems can thams cad dang srog chags thams cad kyis
T16D4382:311b-30: kyang mya ngan las 'das pa ma skyes ma byung
T16D4382:311b-31: ba / ma byas ma bcos pa dang /
T16D4382:311b-43: mi g-yo ba gang yin pa'i mya ngan las 'das
T16D4382:311b-44: pa'i chos kyi mchog de reg cing thob par gyur
T16D4382:311b-45: cig / gnod sbyin gang dag gzhon pa mi bzad
T16D4382:311b-46: dpung btsan lha rdzas gos gyon phreng ba thogs //
T16D4382:311b-47: gang dag 'jig rten gsum mchod mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod pa'i sangs rgyas skyabs song la //
T16D4382:311b-48: lngas rtsen lag na rdo rje nor sbyin dpal can nor bu bzang sras la sogs pa //
T16D4382:312a-1: cad lhan cig rtag tu khyod kyi khyim du chos
T16D4382:312a-2: bzhin bsrung bar shog / lngas rtsen dang ni 'phrog
T16D4382:312a-3: ma bu sdug 'khor bcas nor bu bzang sras dpung
T16D4382:312a-5: gnod sbyin dbang po lag na rdo rje rang gi sde tshan bcas dang rang gi sder bcas dang //
T16D4382:312a-6: gzhan yang gnod sbyin dbang po gang dag bde chen grags ldan bstan pa dag la dga' ba rnams //
T16D4382:312a-7: thams cad mthun par khyod kyi pha tshan dang ni
T16D4382:312a-8: gnyen sdug bcas la rtag tu skyong gyur cig /
T16D4382:312a-9: mtshan mo dang ni nyi ma 'char ka nyi ma'i
T16D4382:312a-10: gung rnams dang // nyi ma nub kar rtag tu
T16D4382:312a-11: khyod la bkra shis ldan par shog / dpal chen
T16D4382:312a-12: lag na rdo rje nor bu bzang dang 'phags skyes
T16D4382:312a-13: gung rnams dang // sogs // khyod dang gnyen 'dun
T16D4382:312a-14: rnams dang bcas la yongs su skyong gyur cig /
T16D4382:312a-15: gtong la dpa' ba rnams kyang khyim 'khor stobs dang
T16D4382:312a-16: 'byor ba grub cing mi nad med par shog /
T16D4382:312a-17: yon tan rnams kyang yon tan tshogs pas 'phel bar
T16D4382:312a-18: 'gyur zhing 'bru rnams rab tu rgyas par shog /
T16D4382:312a-19: mchod rten rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur zhing bcom ldan
T16D4382:312a-20: 'das kyi bstan pa yun ring 'bar bar shog /
T16D4382:312a-21: rgyal po chos bzhin byed pas skyong gyur sems can
T16D4382:312a-22: mtha' dag rab zhi bde ba myong gyur cig /
